adjectives.description: mitriform (comparative more mitriform, superlative most mitriform)

entries.meaning: Having the form of a miter, or peaked cap.
examples: The crisped leaves, with the different nature of the peristome and mitriform calyptra, multifid at the base, are, however, certain marks of distinction.

entries.meaning: (botany) Conical, and somewhat dilated at the base.
